description: The polymer body of a Glock 17 magazine.  It's missing the base plate, which makes it unusable as a magazine.  Attach a base plate to it to make it usable.

variants.description: The polymer body of a Glock 17 magazine.  Without a base plate to hold up the spring inside, it cannot be used as a proper magazine.  Attach a base plate to make it usable.  <variant:black>

//weight: Glock 17 with empty magazine (24.87 oz = 705.05 g) - Glock 17 without magazine (22.05 oz = 625.11 g) = 79.94 g
